website_summaries.verdict: Extremely affordable kitten food. Aims to strengthen the immune system and promote healthy coats.
pros: Adult version available as kitten ages
Customers like the quality of the food, especially considering the low price
cons: Some kitten owners report receiving an adult size of kibble with this product, rather than a kitten size

customer_reviews.title: I dont know why...
customer_reviews.text: But I have bought a bunch of "high end" cat food like blue buffalo and I grabbed this ONE time at walmart to get me though the night until I could go get more "good food" and now this is ALL they will eat. They will cry till I get more.. Little shits know what they want. I thought feeding them a cheaper food was bad but I just want them to be happy... and to shut up haha.
customer_reviews.author: Aften Malone

customer_reviews.title: Love this cat food!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter writing, This kitten food is really nice! It is small so it easy for our kitten to crunch up!😁. Our kitten loves this stuff! Shipped fast! **And also if you are just starting to wean your cat off of KMR, just put hot water over the kitten food and let it get soft so the kitten can eat it easily with out gagging on it!**😁 I recommend!❤️ If this was helpful please select “helpful
customer_reviews.author: clayton wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great food--very palatable
customer_reviews.text: If your cat won't eat anything else, give this a try--no matter what the age. This is one of the most palatable cat foods in the cat food industry. While they do use preservatives, they don't have the additional "human health food" junk in it that causes too much fiber in a cats diet. Too much fiber = messy or sloopy poop. Everyone has nice firm poop on this food. They have great coats, energy and do well! Until the pet food manufacturers get out of blueberries, carrots, cranberries, peas, etc. for their food ingredients, Iams will be one of my primary foods. It's stood the test of time very well.
customer_reviews.author: Charli Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Senior cats
customer_reviews.text: This saved my senior cat. My cat serously Eats NOTHING. He is so turned off by dry food I have 5 different Expensive kibble brands, just sitting there. I finally had my last shot and ordered this kibble since approved by my vet. For the first time in 3 years, my cat at a CUP full of this food and more!!! He loves it! He is gaining his weight back and acts like a young cat again.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Bstein

customer_reviews.title: KITTY LOVES HER IAMS KIBBLE
customer_reviews.text: I always liked IAMS. But this new little kitty was given to us at 5 months old weighing in at only 2.1 #. After a vet check and medicine for worms, this supplemented her well. She was 4.5 # at the next months visit one month later. I gave her the amount on package and small amounts of wet food. But she usually leaves a small amount of the wet ~ But cleans up all the Iams kibble!! You can see her getting progressively healthier in the photos. Her fur has become healthy look too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert and Susan

customer_reviews.title: Cats refuse to eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a pregnant stray. She came with a feral kitten last Summer and I have been feeding her an d the younger cat Speer since. . Then she got pregnant before I could gain her confidence. She is now quite comfortable with us, and I had the veterinarian check her. She is due any day. This food came recommended as good for pregnant cats and weaned kittens. Long story short; they won't eat this and these two are used to scrounging for ANYTHING remotely edible. Nope. Not having it no matter what I pour over it to try to entice them. It's been two meals so far and not even a nibble.
customer_reviews.author: Spud's PlaceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feed for abandoned cats and kittens
customer_reviews.text: Irresponsible bleeping owner moved, leaving at least 8 cats and kittens. We're feeding this food and they all seem to be doing well. We've had very cold weather so built heavy duty shelter and bought a have-a-heart trap. Planning to have them altered and vaccinated - IOW, the things that any pet owner should do. Sorry for the rant and Amazon may not publish this but, all of the cats and kittens clean up their plates every day and their coats look and feel healthy. This is the second bag we've bought.
customer_reviews.author: BhB

customer_reviews.title: Dead Fly's in Bag
customer_reviews.text: Found multiple dead blue bottle fly's in the bag. After I found the second one when pouring my kitten food I searched and found 7 total. I'm unsure if I missed any and my kitten ended up eating one, but he ended up with worms shortly after getting this bag, so I would not recommend it to others. It's not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my kitten at all
customer_reviews.text: My kitten got horrible diarrhea as soon as I tried to transition him to this food. I thought it was a fluke and gave the rest of the bag to a coworker who is fostering some kittens. As soon as she started transitioning them to this food they had diarrhea and started vomiting. I don't know if something is wrong with the bag I got or what. I have generally thought Iams to be good quality food but after this experience I'm not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wimer

customer_reviews.title: Once opened, no way to zip it !
customer_reviews.text: This pack does not have a zip type opening. So once you cut it open, there is no way to seal it back - terrible packaging!. You have to transfer it to another container, to keep it stored. My kitten was given the PetSmart Authority brand dry food so far and we wanted to try a new one. We had been mixing this and the Authority dry food initially and later we started giving this 100%., He likes it and had not any issue with food quality. Will not buy again and moving back to Authority brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: One of the best kitten dry food out there
customer_reviews.text: In my mind this is one of the best dry kitten foods out there. It's a good reputable company that has been around for years. My Siamese has a genetic mutation where she's missing her canines all of them and a molar on each side top and bottom so it's difficult for her to eat other foods not this she loves it. My Sphynx kitten absolutely goes crazy for this this is his favorite .
customer_reviews.author: Meadow Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it! If you love your your gonna buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bag for my five month old Siamese she loves it and when my boyfriend bought a Sphynx cat for me who is 3 months old he loves it too. I normally like to feed my animals grain-free stuff that doesn't have fillers however this is excellent in my eyes and safer because grain free has alot of peas n pea strarch which is giving cats heart issues. BUY this if you care about your kittens it's one of the best around and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Meadow Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Kittens will no longer eat!!!
customer_reviews.text: What happened? I purchased 2 bags ( at different times) and my kittens ( I have 3) LOVED IT!!!! I also feed feral cats and they loved it too! I am on my third bag and my kittens won’t touch it. The feral cats won’t eat it either. I noticed an odd smell when I opened the bag, but cat food can vary in scent, so I served it. Ugh! Cats/Kittens wouldn’t eat. Luckily, I had other food on hand. Amazon wants me to mail the kitten food back- I’m just going to throw it in the trash and contact IAMS.
customer_reviews.author: Susiecat

customer_reviews.title: This product has chamged
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order today on 8/12/2018. I have been ordering this from Amazon for the last 10 months. Today the size and shape of the food has changed. It is 3 times smaller and a round pellet instead of a tri-tipped larger size. The kibble itself the formula is the same. The size is so small I worry my less than 1 year kittens will choke on it. Sad cause they love this food and it one of the dry formulas that doesn't have ingredients that are totally unhealthy and cause illness. T. Laulusa
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take the corn out of this and it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it that this product contains corn however for the price it is an excellent kitten food. The Kibbles are small which makes it easier for kittens to eat and the kittens absolutely love the flavor and it soaks up water fast for kittens that need softer food.
customer_reviews.author: Orcus

customer_reviews.title: Not the same quality. Returning
customer_reviews.text: I buy this from PetSmart my kittens like it. Bought a bag off Amazon the exact same brand/flavor. It looks nasty. Grainy and has hair caked in the bits. They did give me a refund so I’ll head to the store and buy it. Won’t order food online again. Although I’m sure that can happen no matter where you buy it. But this is the first time it’s looked like that.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.F

customer_reviews.title: Not kitten food see pic for size
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this kitten from Amazon for years, recently I found some Kittens and have ordered several bags over the past few month. This last bag of KITTEN food was adult size (see pics below, pic on right is the last bag notice how large these pieces are). I can not tell if the top had been folded over and was refilled or it was a factor error. Either way, this is not kitten size food nor the food I have used for several years to feed Kittens!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The store by my house didn't sell kitten food. So I was a little hesitant buying online without knowing how big or small the pieces would be...They are perfect size! The kittens are having no problem chowing down and I'm sure their mama cat doesn't mind letting them wean off with healthy kitten chow. I will buy this again when they run out, they are growing well so I think it will be sooner rather than later.
customer_reviews.author: B.Azu

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love this food!
customer_reviews.text: I took in two sweet outside kitties. I’m guessing both around 6 months old. I wanted to give them the best start I could afford so I tried this food. They love it! Out local store only had a small 3 lbs bag. So I began looking for a size that would keep my fur babies in kibble for longer then 6 days. So happy I found this size. Taste they love, and it saves me not only coat but multiple trips to the store! Both are happy and healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Our kittens love it, great price
customer_reviews.text: We have two 6 month old kittens, and we make wet and dry food available to them at all times per out vet's instructions. Their tastes in wet food vary, but even if we put out a wet food that's not a hit with them, they are always willing to eat this IAMS dry kitten food, so we never have to worry that they're not eating. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: seagull

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick!
customer_reviews.text: I opened a new bag of this food, fed my kitten once and that night she became ill and threw up/had diarrhea all over the house. Thinking she must have gotten into something, I fed her the food again in the morning. That night she again had diarrhea and was vomiting. I tried a different brand of food the next day and she was fine. I'm not sure if this was tainted food, if the formula changed or what was wrong, but I will NOT be feeding my kitten this Iams kitten food again!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, affordable, fast service.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has a sensitive stomach and had ended up with a bacterial imbalance. We were told to try a kitten food that was easier to digest and we went with this one. Between the medication and the change in food our cat is much better. An additional benefit is that because this is healthier food, she eats less than she did of the cheaper brands. In the long run we're saving money. Another benefit is that I can order it online for the same or slightly cheaper price than the store and they will carry it to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Nicolai

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes - we like that cat likes
customer_reviews.text: While I myself did not taste the Iams Dry Cat Food - from what my cat ‘says’, it tastes great. Cat has an ‘issue’ with food smell and was hooked on Iams kitten dry food - so switching to this one was a godsend as she eventually ‘gave in’ and ate the adult version. We did have to stick her favorite toy in the new cat food for a week and still have to ‘air out’ any future batches - but hey, she is a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Dan from Philly

customer_reviews.title: Gives my kitten diarrhea!
customer_reviews.text: I found an 8 week old kitten and after she got strong enough for dry food, I bought this and introduced it slowly. Every time I give it to her, she gets diarrhea! When I stopped giving it to her, it stopped. I don’t know what is going on, I’ve heard such good things about this brand. I will try one more time but not sure it’s the right fit for her. It looks and smells high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy77

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I tried giving IAMS to my 3 month old kitten after I adopted him and while he liked the flavor enough and had no qualms about eating the food, it immediately gave him soft, incredible smelly poops and frequent diarrhea. I returned this bag ASAP and bought Natural Balance, because no $$ in savings is worth cleaning poop all over my house every day! Invest money in your pet's health and don't buy IAMs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love this
customer_reviews.text: I fed this to my kittens for one year. They love the Iams brand, and are very healthy. Their coats are nice, and I know they are getting great nutrition. Love that I can get this bigger size because my Walmart only carries a small bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: good for my cat's weight
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old cat was losing weight for no apparent reason - didn't seem sick. The vet diagnosed a problem with absorbtion. After a couple of months on medication he stopped losing but remained very thin. I switched him to this kitten chow and after only a few weeks he's gained back about half the lost weight. He also seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on the best kitten foods before adopting two kittens. This food was consistently in the top-5 of my web search results. While it was never #1, it was almost always listed among the best and with a really positive review. The price is much better than many of the other top recommendations and it’s more widely available. So you don’t need to rely on any one source to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Best kitten food!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love this food. I like that the kibble is really small. It has helped my 2 babies who were bottle fed babies transition to dry food. I tried a more expensive brand ( Royal Canin) and we didn’t have good luck with it. It was causing foul smelling poops. Once switched my babies did great!
customer_reviews.author: Kmo.Reads

customer_reviews.title: Cats only food he’ll eat.
customer_reviews.text: Although we now purchase from a store our cat loves this food. We wanted to see him gain weight, which we have not but he seems to have a nicer coat. We switched foods once and he ended up puking all over the house. So also good for their tummies.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  seippel

customer_reviews.title: Everybody loves this.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor must be good, because our middle-aged cat prefers the kitten's food to her own. The kittens purr loudly when eating it. The vet has told us that this is one of the good brands, along with Science Diet, so I am confident that the kittens are getting what they need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wisecup

customer_reviews.title: Wildly popular with kittens (and cats)!
customer_reviews.text: I can't personally vouch the flavor, but the neighborhood "kids" loved it! As for scent? I barely noticed. I've been unable to find it on (infrequent) trips to the grocery store and have resorted to using a commercial brand of dry kitten food they don't seem to like quite as much. Typical of me to spoil feral kittens! 🤦😸 (I'll have to reorder!)
customer_reviews.author: SkyeSolation

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the store
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved this exact label from the store in the smaller bag, so we ordered this large bag. Everything appears to be the same accept that the smaller bag my cat liked from the store included two different color and shaped pieces of food that my cat loved. This bigger bag online only had one type and she barely eats it :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Healthy Kitten Chow - and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is our "go to" kitten food. We used it for our kitties when they were young. We used it to fatten up their poor underweight rescue mama cat. We use it for kittens we foster. They love the food, and we feel good about giving it to them. At age 12 months, we graduate them to Iams Proactive Healthy Adult Dry Cat Food With Chicken, also available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: Switched to Iams, won’t go back!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Purina until my vet described to me how terrible it is for your cat. He explained how it is made in the USA but some synthetic minerals are from China containing rat feces. I’ve been going to this Doctor for awhile now and trust his knowledge! My cats switched over no problem and seem to love the Iams!
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Great choice of food for kitties
customer_reviews.text: I have one kitten, and I ordered one 16 lb bag of this cat food back in september and it just finished this weekend. That was about 4 months worth of food for one kitten. My kitty seems to love his food as he always gets excited when it's feeding time. At first the food smell is strong but I've gotten used to it so it's not too bad. It doesn't seem to linger either.
customer_reviews.author: dmjess15

customer_reviews.title: Good and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Notice no difference in quality compared to if I bought this in store. My cat seems to like this dry food more than any of the expensive ones we’ve tried and I like that I don’t have to pick up from the store. He’s approaching one soon and that’ll be the only reason I change his food, and probably to an adult cat dry food from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina B

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good food.
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is about 5 months old. She was given to me by a friend. They fed her what ever scraps that were left over. So I have tried a lot of different dry foods. I just opened this one about 3 weeks ago and she will not eat it. It smells appetizing and is small enough for kittens to eat. Now I’m stuck with a big bag of food.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Robbie

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love it.
customer_reviews.text: Cats seem to love it. I obviously can't comment on the taste or flavor as the review format asks. Also can't comment on nutritional levels. But my 2 young kittens love it so that's what counts to me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat is eating it.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old adult cat got sick and lost a lot of weight. She's really picky now and won't eat most of the time. I got her this for the high calories to get her to put on weight. She will eat it on HER terms and is doing much better. We bought a 20 lb bag when this little one was finished.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good for Philo
customer_reviews.text: My young 'un, Philo, loves this. He eats this and one other kitten food mixed together. The kibbles are small enough for his mouth. And even my older cat, Boris, will eat this. He looks forward to it as much as Philo
customer_reviews.author: T.S.Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Kitty's of all ages love this food
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 kitty's. 3 two year old and 3 five month old and one of the baby kitty's had a sensitive tummy to other brands kitten food. We feed all 6 kitty's this food per the vet's recommendation. No more oofin up food after eating. Happy kitty's and very healthy according to our vet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: My cats hate it
customer_reviews.text: Idk why but my cats absolutely hate this food. I had them on Purina one kitten and they always ate that so fast. They loved it. Now when I serve them this food, they’ll ignore it and barely eat it. I’m trying to mix it with other things so it doesn’t go to waste but I certainly wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: good for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I switched my cat from wet food to dry IAMS. I thought I would have a hard time but he took it well. No problems he likes it a lot, but be careful. The food is small so if you have a cat with no self control they will eat too much a throw up (happened about 3 times, got it under control now). The bag is big so it lasts a long time, i ordered in January and i still have some left
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: My Cats like it and act with more energy
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this, but seem to get bored with most cat food I buy them. This one I like because they seem to be more energetic and playful than on the prior foods they ate. Sometimes I buy a different flavor and mix a bit into this so they think they have new food!! Trickery -- but it works and they think its all new. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Directec

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Kittens’ Choice
customer_reviews.text: First I researched the best protein based high quality kitten foods. Then I picked the top three most affordable ones. I selected this one to try as most product for the cost. Once it arrived, I did a side by side taste test comparison to see what my kittens liked best between purina kitten chow and this and they preferred this. I will keep buying this food for them until they outgrow it.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom2015

customer_reviews.title: Seems all cats like it no matter the age
customer_reviews.text: My kitten gobbled this stuff up... until he discovered his older siblings eating the "grown up" food. Now he wants theirs, and they want his! Typical cats lol! I now blend foods together so everyone is happy - more kitten food in the kitten's bowl and more adult food in the older siblings' bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Patti H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cat food that all our cats love.
customer_reviews.text: We have a big outside male that comes in the house to eat and some times spends the cold nights in the basement that cool but not cold. He loves the kitty food and our other full grown girl cat loves the kitty food. Of course our kitty loves the kitty food. So far a very good food.
customer_reviews.author: Thousands of Books Read

customer_reviews.title: My cat liked this growing up
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats really liked this food growing up, and the other one quite an picky eater so not so much...because of the flavor maybe? Overall good cat food, they both did fine on it and I would deff recommend Iams. The price is reasonable and I assume the flavor is overall good..except when you have one picky cat. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Good for helping cats gain weight!
customer_reviews.text: I have some rescue cats that need help gaining weight and good kitten food definitely helps! And they love the taste and the super small bites! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: I shopped around for the best value, size and quality of kitten food
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for the best value, size and quality of kitten food. I'm feeding 3 outdoor feral kittens and they tend to go through a lot of food. They enjoy this food and are always thrilled to be fed. Most cat food only comes in smaller bags - like that this is bigger & lasts longer !
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum my kitty says
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old kitty seems to like this a lot. The morsels are tiny, just right for her. It came just in the nick of time, as her other dry food was gone. She likes this better than the other stuff I had for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lu Ann Friday

customer_reviews.title: Seems okay-enough but..
customer_reviews.text: ...my kitten keeps ignoring it and walking across the house to eat the adult cats' food instead, so there's most likely something off with the taste for him to keep doing that to where I need to isolate him so he finally eats that food instead and/or mix it with the adult cat food he likes.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Kitten prefers other kitten food-
customer_reviews.text: My kitten doesn't seem to prefer this food over Kitten Chow. I end up having to mix the two together to get him to eat this brand. Cats are pretty finicky at times though, so may just be my kitty? It is definitely reasonably priced, but since my kitten prefers the other kitten food, I'm rating it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Cats Throwing Up After Eating
customer_reviews.text: For the first few days everything seemed fine, but after a couple days my cat was throwing up literally every other day right after she ate. We figured she was eating too fast. But then my other cat started to throw up after eating too. We started to feed them a different kind of food and we haven’t had any problems. They’re both kittens and had no other problems. Maybe they were allergic to something in the food but after reading other poor reviews about their cats throwing up I don’t think it’s a coincidence. I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iams contains corn grain!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality priced a lot lower than stores in my area! As for ingredients I found that this food has a lot more corn grain than a corn cob!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Is too honest!

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality kitten food. It's smaller pieces of kibble, which is great for kittens. It's a healthy choice without compromising good taste. The other adult cats seem to love it as well! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Kitten approved!
customer_reviews.text: Kitten approved! He was trying to open the bag from the moment he could reach it. That is a high compliment from a picky eater who is spoiled beyond belief.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Floerchinger

customer_reviews.title: Smelly poops is gone!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten was a stray. He had loose, smelly poops I got him Purina Kitten Chow but the problem remained. After being on the Iams Kitten dry food, his stool is normal. He loves the taste too! I’d recommend this to anyone who has a kitten and will be buying this till he’s a year old. My older cat gets the Iams indoor hairball and loves the taste and is happy and healthy. 😺😺
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: Let 'em Eat Iams!
customer_reviews.text: The shelter from which I rescued two kittens recommended this kibble for the first year of life, supplemented by kitten labelled wet food. The girls love it and are growing fast on it. Good price here, too.
customer_reviews.author: xami

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been buying bags of kitten food from stores and it doesn't last very long. As soon as I found this bigger bag, I ordered it and we still have half a bag. This is a much better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave kitten diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: The day after starting this food my kitten got bad diarrhea. I switched food and within 24 hrs he started getting better. Waited a fresh days and then fed this again and back came the diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Both my kitten and adult cat love this!
customer_reviews.text: My kitten seems to prefer this dry food to various wet foods I've been offering him, and my adult cat really likes it, too! It is about the same price as Kitten Chow, but seems to be healthier. I ordered the 3.5 lb. bag the first time, but just placed an order for a 7-pound bag. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Good kibble
customer_reviews.text: My kittens love it. It's not the highest-protein kibble out there, but it's very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it
customer_reviews.text: I foster kittens and all of them eat this kitten food. Nobody has turned away from it, none have had any digestive issues. They all appear to be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: My cat lived 18.5 years, and never had anything but Iams!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by her vet the day I got her, I kept her on Iams kitten food, adult food, and senior food. I highly recommend this line of food. Many factors effect a cat's life, of course. But she loved this food and never had an ailment for 18.5 years. She passed of old age, but it was Iams all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zagottis

customer_reviews.title: Consistency is on point.
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! Kitten will chew this with no problem! He's 16 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Consistent quality at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Rrasonably priced, consistent formula. Have used with kittens and queens for years. Available in most large supermarkets in small bag for one kitten. Available through Amazon in large bag for queen and kittens. Mixes well with nutritional additives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My rescue kittens seem to love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I picked up two rescue kittens from a family member and have always fed them the Iams kitten food. They've never turned their nose up at it and seem to be healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for fostering kittens and mom
customer_reviews.text: Both the mom and kittens seem to be enjoying it. Mom's bowel movements have become much firmer than they were with the previous food I was feeding her. Kittens are very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Galiphile

customer_reviews.title: Kibble change or wrong food in first bag??
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves this stuff, but the kibble on top of the picture is what was in my first bag (#7) I purchased in May and the kibble on the bottom is what was in the #16 bag I received yesterday. The newest bag's kibble is one-third the size of what I got in May.
customer_reviews.author: Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nummies for her tummy
customer_reviews.text: I had a Maine coon for 18 years. I got Stevie Purry in July, she is now 9 months old. She loves this food.
customer_reviews.author: SCR

customer_reviews.title: New Kitty, wanted a good cat food
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to use this! I am a first time car owner and my kitty is 9 weeks old. I was trying to find a go to brand for her that was healthy and that she likes. It came on time, it has no fillers, it's small enough for my baby kitty to eat. If she hates it I'll come back and adjust but until then...I'm happy with it 😊 UPDATE: She loves it. I'm almost out and have to buy more right away!
customer_reviews.author: Tautteaonna

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it didn’t have so much corn. My cats love it, but I’m going to try Blue Buffalo... better ingredients might be worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Secor

customer_reviews.title: 7 healthy beasts in 9 months with this stuff.....
customer_reviews.text: We brought in a preggo stray, that decided to drop seven precious munchkins. The shelters were full so we've raised them for almost a year on this food. They love it and are growing fast, and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: JMed Chewie

customer_reviews.title: Questionable product?
customer_reviews.text: The food pieces are a different shape than the Ian’s kitten that I bought from the store (same package). I’m not sure if it’s the same product/quality otherwise it’s a bit cheaper to order here if it is the same.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smelly kibble
customer_reviews.text: She likes it . She has too much smelly bum so we'll have to change. The kibble smells so strong that it makes the house smell. So it's a no for us. The 1st bag came ripped open probably due to shipping and Amazon shipped another right away!
customer_reviews.author: CrisJoy

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: When I got my kitten the previous owners were feeding her adult cat food. I started her on this and she had more energy and is doing great. She’s healthy, active and happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great. Less filling.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is spot on. I can’t help but put a few nuggets in my own pockets (especially after seeing what it’s done for his shiny coat) every time I fill Sir Sparkle Butt, The Dragon Slayer XVII(s) bowl. As for helping with his brain development, He’s reading at a third-grade level but is still having a bit of trouble discerning between a two and four beat rhythm. Time will tail.
customer_reviews.author: MommyRulz

customer_reviews.title: made from real food ingredients
customer_reviews.text: cats like this stuff and when i read the ingredients, i actually recognize them as food as opposed to non-edibles. i definitely see the value of feeding the kittens healthy, "premium" catfood. no ash or other yucky things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulox

customer_reviews.title: Yum, I guess
customer_reviews.text: My cat is crazy about this stuff, although I doubt the nutritional value of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fat happy kittens
customer_reviews.text: We adopted 2 shelter kittens- one who had suffered from malnutrion due to a gastric parasite before feral rescue. They are both almost a year now and little fatties! The monthly deliveries with a subscribtion was so easy as it's hard to always find the medium sized bag of the kitten food in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Annika

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: We tried this kitten food. The kitten doesn't seem to want to eat it that well. We feed our outside cats. Meow mix tender cuts. He's more interested in that...
customer_reviews.author: Choatson

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinner
customer_reviews.text: Well, I never ate it , but my kid loves it! She only eats chicken flavored food and she eats it every day. The kibbles got small again and she appreciates that.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Pellegrene

customer_reviews.title: All stomach problems are gone!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this about 6 months ago, my 5 month kitty was having diarrhea all the time. Even after a trip to the vet, prescribed medications and probiotics, she just got sick again. We tried 3 different kinds of food trying to slowly switch it up, and this was the only food that resolved all of her stomach issues. Shes a healthy energetic cat now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed product
customer_reviews.text: I finally got my cat to eat dry food with the previous shape of IAMS kitten food (looked like a claw) and then I bought another bag and it is tiny balls that my cat refuses to eat. Very disappointed and now searching for a kitten food or similar fat content cat food with the original claw shape if anyone has any tips!
customer_reviews.author: DJLA531

customer_reviews.title: Kittens approve!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens really like this food I am slowly introducing hard food to them they seem to like it! Packing is good too
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is absolutely in love with this food. He comes running when ever he hears the bag. He loves the dry food of this but not the wet food
customer_reviews.author: Thowra

customer_reviews.title: Product came quickly and bag was intact, hence the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and bag was intact, hence the 5 stars. Unfortunately the cat I bought it for didn't care for it, but that's not anyone's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Not too old to learnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten food, great price
customer_reviews.text: Can't find this size of this kitten food in any of my local stores. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: My kittens and cats love this
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other brands and this is what my kittens like to eat...and are not happy when I run out and try to give them something else.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Good value, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I love that Amazon always has quick delivery of this product! I have been feeding my kittens this since we got them 2 months ago and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Fivestarmama84

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: This food is great. The thing we like the most is adult cat food has something in it for hair balls. This chemical makes both of our cats vomit constantly. Them eating g this food we have virtually no vomiting problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and safe, cats indoors and out love it.
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line product in kitten food and older cats enjoy it too. Promotes good vitamins and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens not so great for older cats.
customer_reviews.text: Gives my 2 yr old cat who was raised on this diarrhea when he eats the kittens food. keeps our 8 month old kitten a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Shops too much

customer_reviews.title: Cat ate it every time. good QUALITY kitten food.
customer_reviews.text: Cat seems to like it but she's 1year old now so I'll need to switch to adult cat food for my next order.
customer_reviews.author: D. LaRu

customer_reviews.title: Not for all kittens.
customer_reviews.text: My cats seemed to like this kitten food; however it did not agree with their tummy. I had to switch dry cat food mid bag.
customer_reviews.author: oakacre4

customer_reviews.title: Iams all the way! 🙃
customer_reviews.text: My cat & unfortunately my dog love it! 😂 I can’t let you know how the flavor is, since I’ve never had it myself😉
customer_reviews.author: Sandi McGoo

customer_reviews.title: The kitties love this kitten food.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't taste this! The flavor review is based on the fact that all my cats love this cat food, not just the kittens! I always get this when I am fostering a little one.
customer_reviews.author: hoosiergator

customer_reviews.title: Kitteens/Cats Not Crazy About It!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 older kittens and some adult cats. None of them seem to love this compared to Purina 1 and Kitten Chow!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Roberts

product_meta.title: Iams Proactive Health Kitten Dry Cat Food Chicken Recipe
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Size:3.5 lb.Help your kitten grow into a strong, playful, energetic, and healthy adult cat with IAMS PROACTIVE HEALTH Healthy Kitten Dry Cat Food with Chicken—a chicken first recipe designed for a cat’s first year of playful, fluffy, furry, feline firsts. Chicken is the #1 ingredient in this high protein kitten kibble (made for outdoor or indoor kittens), designed to support the development of healthy eyes, healthy bones, healthy brains, and healthy hearts. With nutrients like those in their mother’s milk, this dry kitten food helps kittens build strong immune defenses. If you’re looking for kitten food to support healthy development for your kitten’s first year, get your paws on this—and keep your kittens happy, healthy, and ready to pounce as they grow into adult cats with IAMS Healthy Kitten Dry Cat Food.
feature_bullets: Contains One (1) 3.5 Pound; Bag Of Iams Proactive Health Healthy Kitten Dry Cat Food With Chicken
Chicken Is The #1 Ingredient In This Protein Rich Kitten Food Made To Help Your Kitten Develop And Grow Into A Strong, Lean, Healthy Adult Cat
Nutrients Like Those In Mother’s Milk, Including Vitamin E, Help Kittens Build Strong Immune Defenses
Omega 3 Dha Helps Promote Healthy Brain Development
Small Kibble For Small Mouths, Designed For Easy Pickup
Taurine Helps Promote Strong Vision Development And Healthy Eyes
